actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 104-410.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 153.
Mr. Gilchrest moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To designate the United States Courthouse located at 301 West Main Street in Benton, Illinois, as the "James L. Foreman United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Courthouse at 301 West Main Street, Benton, Illinois, as the James L. Foreman United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate the United States Courthouse located at 301 West Main Street in Benton, Illinois, as the "James L. Foreman United States Courthouse".
